meta.description: Language labels for the Extension Builder extension

languageKey.label: An extension key must have minimum 3, maximum 30 characters (not counting underscores)
Illegal character(s) in extension key. Allowed characters are: a-z (lowercase), 0-9 and '_' (underscore)
The key may not begin with one of the following prefixes: tx,u,user_,pages,tt_,sys_,ts_language_,csh_
Extension keys cannot start or end with 0-9 and '_' (underscore)
There is an existing piBased extension with this extension key. Please choose another extension key or rename the existing extension directory
Name
Key
Extension title
Extension Key
The extensionkey should be lowercase and without spaces. It will be the unique identifier for this extension.
Descr.
Description
Version
Target version
If your extension uses features of Extbase/Fluid versions higher than 1.3 you can select your target version here. You have to add the dependency manually in the "Depends on" filed.
State
Alpha
Beta
Stable
Experimental
Test
Category
OR custom
You can define an own category here
The category this extension belongs to in the extension manager.
Miscellaneous
Services
Backend
Frontend
Templates
Examples
Documentation
Priority
This tells the EM to try to load the extension as the very first or last of all extensions. Possible values: top or bottom
Shy
If the extension is marked as shy, it won't be displayed in the extension manager by default
Disable versioning
Check this if your extension needs no support for versioning. This will skip the creation of versioning related columns in the database
Depends on

If the extension is depending on other extensions, enter the extension keys here (one per line followed by a double arrow and the lowest version number). Please leave extbase and fluid since they are required always
Persons
Role
Developer
Product Manager
Email
Company
Frontend plugins
The frontend plugins which have to be registered in the extension
Controller action combinations

Here you can configure, which controller action combinations this plugin/module should have. Example:
Blog => list,show
(one controller per line, actions comma separated)
If you leave this empty, all available actions are configured for this plugin.
Non cacheable actions
Typically create, delete and update actions should not be cached. (Same format as above)
Switchable actions

Make actions switchable in the plugin's form. One line for the label, one for the list of allowed Controller->action pairs (semicolon separated). Example:
Display items
Model->list; Model->show;
Admin
Model->new; Model->create; Model->edit; Model->update;
Backend modules
Main module
Should be unique for this model
Type
More
More options
Advanced options
Remove
Add
n:1
1:n
m:n
Is exclude field?
If set to true, this field will only be visible for admin users per default
New model object
Domain object settings
Object type
Value objects are simple objects that are defined by their value and have no 'identity'
Entity
Value object
Is aggregate root?
If true, the extension builder will generate a repository and default controller actions for this model
Enable sorting?
If true, sorting in the backend is enabled
Map to existing table
If the model should extend an existing table, you can configure this here
Extend existing model class
If this model should extend an existing other model, name it here
Default actions
Action type

For each selected action, the extension builder will generate a template and a action method in the controller of this model. If the model is an aggregate root the default CRUD actions will be generated per default.
show
list
new/create
edit/update
delete
Properties
Property name
The name should be lowerCamelCase and unique in this model
Property type
All types with * are not yet supported by the frontend form generation/validation
String
Text
Rich text
Integer
Floating point
Boolean
Date time
Date*
Time*
Time/Sec*
Select list
File*
Image*
File reference*
Folder*
Password
Is required?
Relations
Name
The name should be lowerCamelCase and unique in this model
Extension properties
Tab label
Lazy loading
Make this relation lazy loading
Relation to external class
If this is a relation to an external model, enter the class name here (The class must exist and be loadable)
